tutorial.speak:
Welcome to the Advanced Search tutorial in B1.church Admin. This guide will show you how to use advanced search features to find specific people in your database.
To access advanced search, navigate to the People section in your B1.church Admin dashboard.
Click on the Advanced Search link at the bottom of the search box.
The advanced search interface allows you to create complex search queries using multiple criteria.
Start by checking a box to enable whatever filters you want to use, such as First Name, Email, Phone Number, or any custom field.
Choose an operator for your search, such as equals, contains, starts with, ends with,or greater than.
Enter the value you are searching for in the value field.
You can add multiple conditions to your search by clicking any of the filters.
You can also search within specific groups or by membership status.
Once you've set up your search criteria, the results will appear in the Search Results section. The results will show all people who match your search criteria.
You can export the search results to a CSV file for further analysis.
